item.title: 特朗普与内塔尼亚胡打破，承认加沙的“真正的饥饿”
item.description: 特朗普，与内塔尼亚胡（Netanyahu）打破，承认加沙（Gaza）中的'真正饥饿' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiy0fvx3lxte1zzu5lvznznzqwnltnltnpetddaafvqy1beqwfiel 8tnfzwaklxvndpmlvnn0zwd1ziy2lqr2dxcmxmsdh4weo4bnjqzxzkdwx6cujvvtrinmprrr0dxegvjyzlzlzlzvw52uq？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>特朗普政府实时更新：总统在加沙与Starmer会面＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 特朗普将加沙'饥饿'危机描述为“真实” ＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 时代杂志 援助的trick流到达饥饿的巴勒斯坦人，因为以色列停下来在加沙的一部分中战斗＆nbsp; cnn> cnn 特朗普说他对小船不了解'一无所知 - 但声称大多数人到达他们可能'坏人' - 英国政治现场直播＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者

item.title: Pro -Ikrainian Hackers声称网络攻击 - NBC新闻后，俄罗斯的Aeroflot取消了航班
item.description: 俄罗斯的Aeroflot取消了Pro-Ikrainian黑客之后的航班，要求网络攻击 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxQY01iUzdWV3E0TVpBTkt5STM4QXc1LXRYUVAyYVVTUjA5UjlzZHFxdUpNcnFMRm5rY1BvLVluTmxtc0V jeTBheTk2U0M1dF95UjJTeDBETFNwUkZTOVlReGdRSmQtZ21jcnE3b2hNRURoV01lWGg3eTZJRTV2T1FpSmQ0b2QyZ0hCRXhvMnVGcUVoYTBQMWhjQ1NBS0xjdkdrcGM5Z0p3?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”> pro-ukrainian黑客声称俄罗斯的Aeroflot ＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS Pro-Ikraine Hacker Group声称负责Aeroflot网络攻击＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxQSDBYQ0t0cFhxeHJpSUlUcG9hbWZ3OHRqaGlHanh0TUc4ZVIzaEdDbkFvUllWa2wwbE1paGNnU2gwWUpVbzl4OGx0 mvotrvhtnzjjjltrldfn6q2howujkuzhuzhuzectnjzsv0fybnfjnniwuuxhv3zhzs1kmuqybgjfuk hyx29fmgy1uwvvc3z5dux1vur2dw5rquoxswnsota0tmlxu2hcwjitzitzufkmen0sl8zvq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>俄罗斯的Aeroflot取消了亲乌克兰黑客的航班要求网络攻击|航空行业＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 监护人 俄罗斯的Aeroflot在网络攻击后取消数十个航班＆nbsp; Financial Times

item.title: 斯塔默告诉特朗普 - 政治
item.description: 英国的加沙饥饿，Starmer告诉特朗普＆nbsp; nbsp; politico.eu 特朗普在达成欧盟贸易协议后与英国总理会面＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinwFBVV95cUxPOS1MbTVCd3g0Nkt1SVNaWmtRWFo0SFdsVlhDb1hNdU1wWlc2OXVyaUJST25zbHA3MmVaaUZCT2Z scustmnvevdb2bhdlruxluxluxlyme5q3nintf5wnvwx09jrjv2g0vwdbrulkmzfqcezkccezkctniawxttt2xooxooxriau9fwvpptpptptptptpptpptptptpptpptpptccm1xzzz0x0x0x0rnhhhhhhzlpvvpffffffffffffe？特朗普</a> ＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; politico.eu 跟踪加沙中的帮助和分析美国贸易交易＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 特朗普声称，他在苏格兰与英国总理Keir Starmer遇到英国总理时停止了六次战争 - 美国政治现场直播＆nbsp; nbsp;

item.title: 调查人员说，大雨可能导致了致命的德国火车出轨 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 大雨可能导致了致命的德国火车出轨，调查人员说＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxtfbqvgnhrzlet2dzakp6umoxbi05rtvc rgziAy1UQ0H4TJF3RHQR1QYTZNPAFK4MLPCVWNKTFLKNKLHSWJIUETADGPJZ2VAQ2VAQ2JJN2JN2TOQUIB0PBQQ？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>污水溢出在德国导致了致命的火车出轨，警方说＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc ＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; Sky News 3被德国火车出轨杀死，这可能是由于大雨触发的压倒性＆nbsp; nbsp; cbs news 警方说，在德国的火车坠机事故中丧生的三人说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 泰国曼谷市场上的市场枪击事件中有五人 - 半岛电视台
item.description: 在泰国曼谷的市场射击中被杀死的五人href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmigafbvv95cuxoatzlc2fpc3ryrm1wx0swx0swdflatxfqslmyt25tz3brazdluhfprnlibt dinnz6cu5xltljr2ngs2xzcm55ym1zzk9duwjgytcwm1jqrdi3muxkykdbow5nzzfjmnhtevhhwdcwxzzy3sghxr2nhbzczczczczczczczczwtdsrwtdsrwlkyjr3sq？ target =“ _ blank”>至少有5人在繁忙的食品市场中大规模射击中丧生，嫌疑人发现死亡：报告＆nbsp; nbsp; people.com 寒冷的镜头捕获大众射击者平静地携带枪支，然后在泰国市场杀死5个＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约邮报 枪手在射击自己之前在曼谷市场杀死了五人href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte04uwsxskskskskskwc1jnff2enrlzufyy0z1 anzea1rpegxvc25isgnqt2tdbdh3zgxryu0ztlrptundalz5t1fozwe4mdrdvi13qljhswx0vlg4slfcdw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>泰国：在曼谷市场大规模射击中有五人＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc

item.description: 刚果博士的ADF：是与叛乱分子的，被指控在Komanda中杀死基督教徒的崇拜者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiswfbvvv95cuxqvlpgbng5oelxwe EYMHC0LUQ2OG5XDF9XMK14UDBBDKOWA1R0OW9MVHLGUL9TQZVZVZVZUZGTRNMZMNMZMNBOMKHDN014OTFI a2stUlVsYlhQYlZyMmVBeUl4cUNCQnRibGpOWEZFcEVySk1hdGVObTlfYUZacVZkZF94SGxOUkozUUg2UXl6MDV2VV9nTmY4MU5LeGFaZkZON1ZsSTdrUVBCUnhoOGo0MU5rVlVaeFhmZw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>教皇：可能在刚果民主共和国教堂攻击中'烈士'的血液成为和平的种子＆nbsp; nbsp; 梵蒂冈新闻 数十几个被刚果教堂的ISIS联机叛军杀死＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihgfbvv95cuxorwjfstn1s0thtlh1stbpuwtqz2zjas1s1sefvmueppnhrwbdf yrldkq2jjqwgtvdzhmeii1vgvjvjvurtyvhgvzi2tne1q0dccxvjjotq4znprwtzfb0vub01voej1aen1r3ppntuxqnpnpntuxqnhpytflr0w5tulsafhrw le0vmtyoelpuwjbqdibiwfbvv95cuxntfr5r04wazhawuvtz2jjrfphzfg5nfdpz3j6uzz3j6uzz5c3b4tddblx0xsbul2n3e1runjv3riuvnpu1j HVG1JB19OZFDIMZNKQ2FOTHZMULE2Z0LPTWF3RTA0LUNBTG9SA1Y3MZLDBKPFAWFVYWDUBM9CRNNARAY00TUOWY0HMCE94HMCE94DJJAUUVV？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>至少有21个在伊斯兰国家支持的叛军对东刚果教堂的袭击中丧生，民事领导人说＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn> cnn <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxNVUtIVUlPeXgybG1oMUVLb2NXVE1EYXhtV09ocE9tbHZURy1CblR6MDZHZHNCTGl2cWpCUk92dnVEbzd TZWUXQW5CWW9RNMDOVXDJDZBAQ0OWVJZDKLZDKLZDECJDECJDVWKZVATVNZU0NKTRWERUS0DN A2M3CLVRM3HECDBSBJF0NKVFU0NGVU5PDXLRQW9EUGNUZJFYVMT1OXVJVJVJV1PYMMLN？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>对刚果教会的袭击杀死了近40名崇拜者。这是要知道的＆nbsp;＆nbsp; ap News

item.title: 妇女欧洲欧洲杯2025年决赛：英格兰在罚款中击中西班牙连续第二欧元冠军-Yahoo Sports
item.description: 妇女欧洲欧洲杯2025年决赛：英格兰在罚款中击败西班牙，赢得第二连续欧元的标题＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> yahoo Sports href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiz0fvx3lxte1lrnk2sjnozgn0mmxly3vpotnjdjhqtuhrx2ixa e5pexe4zxraywu5ovlfeelhexi4ekxwyljwqkthr1z2ng5xukhwqu95yyy1fnk5ythmzsnfxnfxndftq09yeufsmtlolta？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>'凯利（Kelly href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiogFBVV95cUxNNWk4UTVWREFQbXp4dUtWZlFrdmJJamNSbkxsLWJ0OVlsV1YtSkRTalRXWFJ5Z3JRN1RWSEdpa2phZ DNFazFmc29vNFBzTkREak1jcENTS190NzFGWHhLX2lDLW9jenQ2TGlyWWRmUkxub25VSnZRNmlyZTdRTEF1MkFyR2J5LXpncVpLTWx3MkRqdFFnOVNra09nQ1h6T3A1OGc?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>唱歌，跳舞和一个叫做雷吉的卡瓦普：英格兰如何庆祝欧元荣耀＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiqgfbvvv95cuxqd0m4a09ktnz pefphbnjlnepzujdehf1yi14agvcb2ezoelozvjrlxhbn1vnrku2lwzhc0r0a3zzzfd4rl DJRTDXMUZMD211OEHRTTDAU05YREZ6Y3LVAVPLDWM5CUHGOGRFMTZJCEO2OXHJOEN2S0RNZ vlwyu5gr0lxbk9zzjy5d0jva1vnnlhrzndrzhzrtjhyq0xgwhzvt0gtvg11adhuqq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>不要停止相信：英格兰如何赢得2025年欧洲欧洲杯 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinAFBVV95cUxNeTUtcERtVkdBM2p1eXFrTUJPdG5uMlpWaUpKdlVUMU1FM2FaTDk3bXpQRGxzbFZmc25YTlNzX 0FQLUhVSDlCQms2UjlfS2oxWlJlNW9ya0dLbzhKRlFReDZYN3BXVGVkZTBrSTd1M3hNcl9nZ3ZQYmMxZ1dXY01ULXNPYUgyNDF2eFVWU2N3bXl2dXJmNVd0TU5Sb1k?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>英格兰如何无效西班牙：关闭世界冠军的威格曼战术＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报

item.title: SCMP报道，中国，我们将瑞典的关税停顿延长了90天。
item.description: 中国，我们将瑞典的关税暂停延长了90天，SCMP报告＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 美国。随着贸易停战的到期，中国会遇到＆nbsp; 纽约时报 美国，中国举行有关关税休战的新谈判，轻松的特朗普 - XI会议＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 美国。中国可能会延长贸易休战以延迟高价 ＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 美国和中国将在今年晚些时候在特朗普-XI峰会上在斯德哥尔摩进行交谈＆nbsp; nbsp; ABC News

item.title: 随着温度飙升，希腊和土耳其的数十个野火燃烧 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 在希腊和土耳其燃烧的数十个野火，温度飙升＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiv0fvx3lxtfb1epjdwdutwvdmmzoyk02z2j3th LSBHZAX0ZTVLPJUWLWDKLRCZJFCLM1SZBNTHRTHRTHTHR4YWXEDLDZBZFYAG9JUC1QEMPEZUVYLXVVMLBSMV90TQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>南欧热浪粉丝多个野火＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 野火燃烧雅典北部郊区，居民告诉居民撤离＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxpefhangjyvgpirxppdktpdktyyly2n0xgogpvb01sx1sx1zrsdhunrzy0hquwtztmhdek xvswpkwhfzz2tgc1b2rvbe55nmpwawn4chdorgx6qudgshpfmgshpfmg0xrdvtsnpznmdrsw9zr1l1zss1omjhpywhltnz4qk1nrjixdldkyvsqunvsqu9yv2xutw？ target =“ _ blank”>土耳其的致命野火，希腊迫使数千人撤离灼热＆nbsp; axios <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitgFBVV95cUxQN3UxSlpadENjeWk1NXhvTGdNaEEtc2xJNzNWaTNYQjN1NEt3S2ZWRjRUaHBBejl6cUlvTDAwYWI0Und3MGtzRndvWk favlgxm3y4cuduue1kcgdfvgx3of9kovhnbhjiwwpaaxrzennovlk2u2dtaep3cgk4dkzkc05lu lnkdgh2qkdeymxqtunwqmhjehnvq1q1vxlirfrsz0pste5prudzqmjcx1nfrgtcqs1luq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>希腊战斗在国家各地与野火战斗，撤离村庄
